price: 19. Bastará con un solo soplido (del cuerno) para que (resuciten y) contemplen (los horrores de ese día).
arabic: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجۡرَةٞ وَٰحِدَةٞ فَإِذَا هُمۡ يَنظُرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: fa-innamā hiya zajratun wāḥidatun fa-idhā hum yanẓurūna
